bug.short_desc: Bookmark this page window - Folder option drop down menu not remaining on top.

assigned_to.name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

long_desc.thetext:
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0 Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Drop down list not remaining on top of bookmark window. Seems to be staying open behind bookmarks window and only showing when mousing over the area the list should be.
Reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1.Click on star in address bar or firefox menu > bookmarks > bookmark this page 2.Click on 'Folder:' drop down list 3. Actual Results: Drop down list not remaining on top of bookmark window.
Expected Results: Drop down list should remain open until option selected, mouse moved away or clicked again.

Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.2a1pre) Gecko/20110405 Firefox/4.2a1pre
Works fine for me. Please try if you can reproduce it or if it works fine
1.in safe mode. https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Safe+Mode
2.or by creating a new profile https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Managing+profiles#Creating_a_profile.
Works fine in safe mode. Also just realised that the problem is only occuring in the second screen of my extended desktop. Sorries.
Considering Comment 2 marking this as Resolved Worksforme
